name: Donquixote Rosinante
text: Opponent's Turn: If this Character is rested, your active Characters with a original cost of 5 cannot be K.O'd by effects. On Play: You may rest this Character: Play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 5 from your hand.

effect.text: If this Character is rested, your active Characters with a original cost of 5 cannot be K.O'd by effects.
You may rest this Character: Play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 5 from your hand.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'SEC' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card has a 'SPECIAL' icon next to the power value, but this is not a rarity.
